content.rendered:
EAC
The Donaghey Emerging Analytics Center
Learn More
Who We Are
The EAC is a research center at UA Little Rock that specializes in immersive visualization, virtual/augmented/mixed realities, interactive technologies and ubiquitous computing, and the intersection of machine learning and cybersecurity.
Learn More
Our Mission
The mission of the EAC centers on using immersive and interactive visualization research to solve complex, big data problems in industry, government, and research organizations.
Our Directorates
Previous
Next

Our Directorates

Learn More

Cybersecurity

Human-Computer Interaction

Machine/Deep Learning

Health Informatics

Immersive Visualization

Ubiquitous Computing and IoT​

Our Projects

Search & Rescue Helicopter Training Simulator

Learn More >

Interactive Interior Design

Interactive Interior Design Our research team is exploring the use of immersive spaces to perform interactive design. Our current project focuses on designing a reconfigurable

Learn More >

Campus 360

Campus 360 Campus 360 is our virtual tour application developed to display the beautiful campus here at the University of Arkansas at Little Rock. Users

Learn More >

Augmented Reality Medical Gown

Augmented Reality Medical Gown This augmented reality mobile app is intended to show a future direction for personalized medical records. The user-owned gown can carry

Learn More >

Topography Collaboration “TopoCollo”

Topography Collaboration “TopoCollo” A significant challenge in the simulation of real environments for multiple participants is the ability to network multiple and disparate devices in

Learn More >

3D Sculpting

3D Sculpting One of the most exciting aspects of virtual reality is how much it stimulates our imagination. We have developed a 3D sculpting environment

Learn More >

Networked Hololens￼

Learn More >

Anatomical Eyes

Anatomical Eyes One of the core challenges in medical education and practice is getting familiar with anatomy and all of the different parts that make

Learn More >

Cyber Arena 360

Cyber Arena 360 UA Little Rock is at the forefront of the cybersecurity field. In order to encourage continued learning and advancement in cybersecurity, we

Learn More >

Upcoming Events

Women in STEM Summit

Tuesday March 7th, 2023 6:00-8:00 PM Attend Online or In-Person at the Arkansas Regional Innovation Hub at 204 E 4th St., North Little Rock, AR.

Learn More >

2023 Arkansas GenCyber Strength Training Program

The 2023 Arkansas GenCyber Strength Training Program is a Summer CyberSecurity Experience. Unlock your Cybersecurity potential with Gen Cyber! Get hands-on experience in the field

Learn More >

Technology Student Association Event

The Technology Student Association is a national organization of students engaged in STEM (science, technology, engineering and mathematics) and business leadership through regional, state, and
